mapper.select: SELECT u.*, CASE WHEN sd.name IS NOT NULL THEN sd.name WHEN sf.name IS NOT NULL THEN sf.name WHEN p.name IS NOT NULL THEN p.name END AS name FROM cu_user AS u LEFT JOIN cu_student AS sd ON u.id = sd.id LEFT JOIN cu_staff AS sf ON u.id = sf.id LEFT JOIN cu_professor AS p ON u.id = p.id where u.id = #{userId};
mapper.update: UPDATE cu_user SET password = #{afterPassword} WHERE id = #{id};
